job.title: Founding Software Engineer
job.description: <p>We are looking for a well-rounded engineer to join us in building our low-code platform from the ground up. You’ll solve hard problems and help shape the future of our company.</p><p><br></p><p>We’re founded by two former Google engineers and graduated from YC’s W21 batch. We recently featured at Google I/O and have an incredible list of supporters and advisors.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>What You Will Work On</strong></p><ul><li>Spec, design, and build functionality in FlutterFlow.</li><li>Help us decide what to build next. You will partner with our founders and team to identify and prioritize new features.</li><li>Write code that writes code! We work in an interesting and challenging space that few people get to work on.</li><li>Talk to customers to understand their needs.</li><li>Be the right hand to our CTO. Help solve complex problems and mentor more junior team members.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Who you are</strong></p><ul><li>4+ years of proffesional experience as a Software Engineer.</li><li>You write high-quality code that is readable and reliable.</li><li>You have a start-up mentality. You understand shipping a feature early and learning from the result is more important than perfecting it.</li><li>Self-starter who likes to take initiative.</li><li>You are more interested in getting to the right answer than being right.</li><li>You are driven and derive a sense of purpose from building something that matters.</li><li>You are always willing to roll up your sleeves and pitch in when the team needs help.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Bonus Points</strong></p><ul><li>1+ years of experience with Flutter and Dart</li><li>Experience with Firebase</li><li>Experience with mobile app development</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Benefits</strong></p><ul><li>Live anywhere in the US</li><li>Generous salary and equity package</li><li>Flexible Vacation / Sick Leave</li><li>Flexible work hours</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>About Us</strong></p><p>We are building a low-code platform to dramatically improve how mobile applications are built. What used to take months of development time, can now be built within hours and days.</p><p><br></p><p>We’re founded by two former Google engineers and graduated from YC’s W21 batch. We recently featured at Google I/O and have an incredible list of supporters and advisors.</p>
